json_to_edit.voice_over: The brushstrokes became my prison, each color a bar in my self-made cage.
json_to_edit.description: Vincent finds himself trapped within his own surreal painting.
json_to_edit.name: Canvas Confinement
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Painter Vincent becomes trapped inside his own artwork, struggling to escape.

qa.action: Vincent's studio transforms into a living, breathing painting.

hf.action: Vincent stumbles through a landscape of giant, moving brushstrokes.

tr.action: Vincent's feet sink into a pool of liquid color, struggling to move.

xc.action: Vincent's eyes widen in panic as he realizes he's trapped.

ka.action: Vincent runs through a maze of abstract shapes and forms.

fn.action: Vincent touches a wall, causing it to ripple and change colors.

af.action: Vincent's hands frantically try to peel away layers of paint.

qo.action: The painted world starts to collapse around Vincent.

fp.action: Vincent desperately reaches for a tear in the fabric of the painting.

va.action: Vincent's eye reflects the swirling chaos of the painted world.

edit_command: Add two shots at the end and remove the first shot. Don't change anything else.

updated_json.description: Vincent finds himself trapped within his own surreal painting.
